mapper.select: SELECT bp.BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM as BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM, bp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, p.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_POST_NUM, p.SELL_PRODUCT_PHONE, bp.BILL_ORDER_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(b.BILL_ORDER_DATE,'%m-%d %H:%i') as Bill_ORDER_DATE_TIME, BILL_COOKING_TIME, b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS , b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DETAIL , b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_POST_NUM , bp.USER_NUM, bp.BILL_PRODUCT_QUANTITY, bp.BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD, bp.BILL_COOKING_TIME, bp.BILL_STATUS FROM tbl_bills_product bp join tbl_sell_product p on bp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM =p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM join tbl_bills b on bp.BILL_ORDER_NUM =b.BILL_ORDER_NUM where BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD!=1 and BILL_STATUS=1 order by BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM desc;

SELECT bp.BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM as BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM, bp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, p.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_POST_NUM, p.SELL_PRODUCT_PHONE, bp.BILL_ORDER_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(b.BILL_ORDER_DATE,'%m-%d %H:%i') as Bill_ORDER_DATE_TIME, BILL_COOKING_TIME, b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS , b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DETAIL , b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_POST_NUM , bp.USER_NUM, u.USER_PHONE, bp.BILL_PRODUCT_QUANTITY, bp.BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD, bp.BILL_COOKING_TIME, bp.BILL_STATUS FROM tbl_bills_product bp join tbl_sell_product p on bp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM =p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM join tbl_bills b on bp.BILL_ORDER_NUM =b.BILL_ORDER_NUM join tbl_user u on bp.USER_NUM =u.USER_NUM where BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD!=1 and BILL_STATUS=2 and u.USER_NUM=#{userNum} or BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD!=1 and BILL_STATUS=3 and u.USER_NUM=#{userNum} or BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD!=1 and BILL_STATUS=4 and u.USER_NUM=#{userNum} order by BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM desc;

SELECT bp.BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM as BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM, bp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, p.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_POST_NUM, p.SELL_PRODUCT_PHONE, bp.BILL_ORDER_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(b.BILL_ORDER_DATE,'%m-%d %H:%i') as Bill_ORDER_DATE_TIME, BILL_COOKING_TIME, b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS , b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DETAIL , b.BILL_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_POST_NUM , bp.USER_NUM, bp.BILL_PRODUCT_QUANTITY, bp.BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD, bp.BILL_COOKING_TIME, bp.BILL_STATUS FROM tbl_bills_product bp join tbl_sell_product p on bp.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM =p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM join tbl_bills b on bp.BILL_ORDER_NUM =b.BILL_ORDER_NUM join tbl_user u on bp.USER_NUM =u.USER_NUM where BILL_DELIVERY_METHOD!=1 and BILL_STATUS=1 and SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS=#{sellProductAddress} order by BILL_PRODUCT_LIST_NUM desc
